description:
T2 Laurel - Cut back off building to give a 2m clearance, leaving height at approximately 10m and crown spread at 4m 
T3 Sycamore - Cut back off building to give a 2m clearance, leaving height at 18m and crown spread of 5m 
T4 Silver Birch - Crown reduce by approximately 4m leaving height at 12m and reduce side laterals by approximately 1.5m, leaving crown spread at 3m 
T5 Silver Birch - Crown reduce by approximately 4m leaving a height at 12m, reduce side laterals by approximately 0.5m, leaving crown spread at 2m 
T6 Cotoneaster - Crown lift to 2.4m leaving at a height of approximately 5m and crown spread of 2m 
T7 Cotoneaster - Crown lift to 2.4m leaving at a height of approximately 5m and crown spread of 2m 
T8 Holm Oak - Crown lift to 2.4m, leaving at a height of 12m and crown spread at 6m 
T9 Sycamore - Cut back off building to give a 2m clearance leaving at a height of 12m and crown spread of 5m
decision_conditions: The specification is not suitable and therefore needs to be confirmed. The specification needs to be measurable and quantifiable so that we can understand the amount that is to be removed in meters. We need to know the amount to be removed and the remaining crown size. E.g. 2m crown reduction in width and 2m reduction in height, leaving a canopy spread of 3m and height of 5m
